description: Convert between different types (Message, Data, DataFrame)

input_data.info: Accept Message, Data or DataFrame as input

auto_parse.info: Detect and convert JSON/CSV strings automatically.

output_type.info: Select the desired output data type

success.converted_to_message: Successfully converted input to Message type
success.converted_to_data: Successfully converted input to Data type
success.converted_to_data_with_parsing: Successfully converted input to Data type with automatic parsing
success.converted_to_dataframe: Successfully converted input to DataFrame type ({rows} rows)
success.converted_to_dataframe_with_parsing: Successfully converted input to DataFrame type with automatic parsing ({rows} rows)

errors.message_conversion_failed: Failed to convert input to Message type: {error}
errors.data_conversion_failed: Failed to convert input to Data type: {error}
errors.dataframe_conversion_failed: Failed to convert input to DataFrame type: {error}
